channel.title: Big Problems i need some help
channel.description:
Hi there, i have encountered some problems and I'd like to discuss about them, i might as well post this rather than posting lots as the people say.
Here goes ------------ STUFF I NEED HELP WITH ----------- *Changing the attack interface of a delta 317 *Raising slayer xp *Putting an anti dupe thingy in client.java (A little bit, but not so much) *Making barrage a multi Target spell like 2speced and Real runescape *Proper skulls like real rs ;D *Dclaws changing that to 60 att and 1 def without making all the dragon items 1def *Clan chat *Actaul WORKING TeleTabs how to make it tele you some where... And that's it, :D Ty for your help. :D

@cowbell wrote:

ok ty any more things?

item.title: Big Problems i need some help
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

  1. There’s an addSkillXP(int, int); somewhere in killing monsters. Find it (sorry; I don’t know the number of the slayer skill).

  2. Just alter the damage radius in the spell.

  3. GetCLDefence, use ItemID rather than ItemName.

  4. Add a case for them.

Coincidence that I only did evens.

Read full topic
item.source: Big Problems i need some help

item.title: Big Problems i need some help
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Well for the first problem, you make your own model or take it out of from someone else’s client and replace it with the one you want changed. Also I’m sure you can find the other questions inside of tutorial section, I do not have time to diagnose all these problems.

Read full topic
